DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine efficacy BIA 2 093 treatment epileptic patient refractory simple complex partial seizure without secondary generalization .
DOC.brief_title: A Placebo-controlled Study Investigate Safety Efficacy BIA 2-093
DOC.detailed_description: This clinical trial perform multicentre , add-on , double-blind , randomised , placebo-controlled , phase II study . During double-blind treatment phase ( 12 week ) patient assign three treatment group receive BIA 2 093 daily ( ODG - once-daily group ) , BIA 2 093 twice daily ( TDG - twice-daily group ) placebo ( PLG - placebo group ) , respectively . Daily dose BIA 2 093 increase four-weekly period ( 400 mg , 800 mg 1200 mg ) . On completion 12-week double-blind treatment period , 1-week tapering period schedule .
DOC.criteria: Male female patient age 1865 year Patients simple complex partial seizure without secondary generalization since least one year prior randomisation visit At least 4 seizure per month within last 2 month prior randomisation Stable dose regimen maximum two follow AEDs : phenytoin , valproate , primidone , phenobarbital , lamotrigine , gabapentin , topiramate , clonazepam , 2 month prior randomisation Electroencephalogram ( EEG ) finding contradict epilepsy diagnosis ( e.g. , primarily generalize epilepsy ) Written informed consent .
